This question resolves as **Yes** if the Federal Register, which can be accessed [here](https://www.federalregister.gov/presidential-documents/executive-orders/joe-biden/2024), lists 1 or 2 executive orders for President Joe Biden for the month of December 2024. If it lists >0, this question resolves as **No**.
